about_the_game:
Shovel & Swindle is a co-op game where you and a friend explore a graveyard among other locations and rob its graves to earn money while avoiding the guards and uncovering many secrets. Make sure you balance exploring and gaining money to progress.

Inspired by Burke & Hare, you'll go into a graveyard with the sole intention of robbing graves either alone or with a friend... But there's more than what meets the eye!

Explore interconnected levels full of secrets and shortcuts, but be wary of the bobbies, if they catch you, that's it for the night!

Use the money you gain to upgrade your base and purchase tools to help you in your gravedigging escapades.

Uncover the secrets hidden right before your eyes to obtain what you desire most.

short_description: Shovel & Swindle is a fun co-op game, where players will make a living by graverobbing as Scotland's infamous Burke and Hare! Explore multiple locations and uncover the graveyard's secrets by solving puzzles, and avoiding getting caught by patrolling bobbies!
